entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xamarin Forms Namespace Caused Failure to Generate Code Behind and Compile ALL XAML Files #18637
  • [XVS][VSM][MAUI]There were 3 errors when building and canceling solution several times #18636
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] MAUI project won't build with the 8.0.0-rc.2.9530 version on Azure Pipeline #18632
  • Error - "Android" system image is incomplete #18629
  • [Android] Rectangle rendering is broken #18628
    Backlog
  • MAUI Map set internal padding to move native controls and images #18627
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's EmptyView Does Not Fill Vertical Space #18626
  • .net Maui Switch thumbcolor can not be set in code after upgrading to .net 8 #18625
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test E1 #18623
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Cannot change Japanese input method after open basic authentication dialog #18619
  • Connecting or Disconnecting Physical Barcode Reader is triggering App Return to Initial Index Page #18618
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test G1 #18613
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Enhancement] Wifi Adapter Controls #18612
    Backlog
  • [Windows]Title bar cannot be hidden when full screen #18611
  • StringContent has no constructors defined #18610

Closed

  • Localization of MenuBarItem on Android not working #18556
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout is already a child of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ContentPage. Remove Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ContentPage before adding to MauiAppPopupError.LoadingView. #18614
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test G5 #18617
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #17977
  • Fix iOS Visual Runner so that all tests pass consistently #18378
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Memory leak with CarouselView #17726
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Compile error multilanguage app upgrade existing project to .net 8 (visual studio preview version 6) #18576
  • Incorrect/Cut off shadows #15924
  • [BUG] 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk.iOS.Manifest-7.0.100 16.4.7125' has incompatible package type. #18604
  • Issue with .NET MAUI in VS 2022 #16027
  • iOS: svg images only bit color, any toolbar image doesn't resize #15728
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #16255
  • Can't build Maui from main branch #15470
  • .NET MAUI not supported on Ubuntu #15929
  • Expandable items in a StackLayout don't work properly on iOS #16150
  • Programmatically way to Bootstrap Windows Platform in pure C# #8413
  • Error on archiving .net7.0 for android with target platform ARM32: "Invalid option 'ARM32' for /platform; must be anycpu, x86, Itanium, arm, arm64" #15691

PullRequests

Created

  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix PlatformStringSizeService on iOS/Catalyst to use correct API #18621
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨

Merged

  • Update .NET Workloads #18633
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.12 to 120.0.0.15 #18591
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.13.5.2136 to 0.13.10 #18597
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G5 #18622
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI from 0.9.0 to 0.9.2 #18596
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.8 to 7.3.9 #18600
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix package downgrade errors by fixing versions causing error and introducing/consolidating variables #18562
  • Reinstate MediaPicker.CaptureVideo for Android (API 33) #18620
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [android] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` #18584
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Merge `net8.0` into `main` #18609
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Move MAUI Blazor template files to match ASP.NET Blazor template #18608
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18553
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
    area/layout 🔲
  • Better ARM support iOS device tests #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/testing
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 SR1
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.1 #18592
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2088.41 to 1.0.2151.40 #18599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump CommunityToolkit.Mvvm from 8.1.0 to 8.2.2 #18595
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump System.CodeDom from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0-rc.2.23479.6 #18594
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • fix: maui template won't build on Linux #18580
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Attempt to solve CI errors - could not copy / unable to copy with `<BuildInParallel>false</BuildInParallel>` #18585
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
